name: Yora Adventures
storyline:
WELCOME TO SEPTURIA, HOME OF THE SEVEN ASPECTS 
 
Septuria is an old continent with young inhabitants. The human kingdom “Kadara” is located by the sea. Driven by the joy of discovery and curiosity, people search for the origin of their existence. Since the “Septurion”, the “Book of the Seven”, was found centuries ago, many organizations and individuals are trying to fathom its secret. According to legend, the one who is able to read and understand it, is given unbridled power over the elements, forbidden knowledge of the cohesion of the world and even the power over life and death. 
 
So far no one has been able to decipher the tome. Some are of the opinion that it should never be opened, others long for its power and do everything to get their hands on just a few pages.
summary: Yora Adventures is the smart Tabletop RPG on your mobile device. Use integrated maps, clean adventure text sections, interactive character sheets and connected devices to experience your next game session in a new way - for players and game masters! Why don't you let your mobile phone do all the tiresome work and focus on what pen and paper gaming is about: immersive adventures through rich interactions!
